DOC.brief_summary: Double blind RCT compare elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy use warm , humidify gas ( new ) laparoscopic cholecystectomy cool , dry gas ( usual ) . Sample size 200 patient . Outcome measure postoperative opiate analgesia use , post operative numerical pain score .
DOC.brief_title: Study Use Humidified Warmed Gas Effect Post-Operative Pain Laparoscopic Cholecystectomies
DOC.criteria: elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy 18 year age 18 year age prisoner convert open operation secondary invasive procedure operation unable give consent whatever reason
